Title: Requires the sale or delivery of cannabis products by distributors to retailers be in exchange for cash to be paid at the time of delivery or on terms requiring payment by such retailer for such cannabis
Summary: Requires the sale or delivery of cannabis products by distributors to retailers be in exchange for cash to be paid at the time of delivery or on terms requiring payment by such retailer for such cannabis products.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, in relation to requiring that the sale or delivery of cannabis products by distributors to retailers be in exchange for cash to be paid at the time of delivery or on terms requiring payment by such retailer for such cannabis products
